ExecutableQuery - Class in space.arim.api.sql
Immutable, thread-safe representation of an SQL query with unparameterised statement and parameters passed to the constructor

PreparedStatement objects should be based on ExecutableQuery.statement() with parameters ExecutableQuery.parameters() attached to the PreparedStatement using PreparedStatement#setObject(int, Object)
ExecutableQuery(String, Object...) - Constructor for class space.arim.api.sql.ExecutableQuery
